announcement.content: 【Prediction Event】This prediction is for UEFA Champion League season 19/20.  Not for EURO CUP 2020. For the current event, the FINAL match will be on 31st May 2020 and we will announce our winner on 1st June 2020 between 12pm ~ 1pm.

announcement.announcement_simplified: 【预测活动】此预测活动是仅关于UEFA Champion League season 19/20 （欧洲冠军联赛19/20）而并不是EURO CUP 2020（欧洲国家杯2020）。依照目前的活动，最终决赛将在5月31日2020年举行，而我们将在6月1日中午12点至1点间宣布得奖者。

announcement.content: 【Prediction Event】38 days event has finally ended. We received 5800+ Predictions from 3300+ players. With this amount of predictions we are expecting few winners to claim the prize pool. Member with correct prediction will be announced on 1st June 2020 between 12pm to 1pm.

With this amount of predictions we are expecting few winners to claim the prize pool. Member with correct prediction will be announced on 1st June 2020 between 12pm to 1pm.
announcement.announcement_simplified: 【竞猜活动】38天的活动终于结束了。我们收到了来自3300多位玩家的5800+次竞猜。如此多的竞猜，我们预计会有至少一位赢家。我们将在2020年6月1日中午12点至下午1点之间宣布赢家.请留守我们的 Facebook 和网站哦

announcement.content: 【System】Effectively on 10th Feb 2021, there will be changes on Withdrawal Frequency according to rank. Currently we are having huge volume of withdrawals and we hope that our member able to perform withdrawal all in 1 transaction instead of seperate into few transactions that increase our traffic. The purpose of this adjustment  is to improve our efficiency on withdrawals. Sorry for any inconvenience caused. 【Normal Rank - 1 time/day, Bronze Rank - 1 time/day, Silver Rank - 2 times/day, Gold Rank - 3 times/day, Platinum - 5 times/day】
announcement.announcement_english: 【System】Effectively on 10th Feb 2021, there will be changes on Withdrawal Frequency according to rank. Currently we are having huge volume of withdrawals and we hope that our member able to perform withdrawal all in 1 transaction instead of seperate into few transactions that increase our traffic. The purpose of this adjustment  is to improve our efficiency on withdrawals. Sorry for any inconvenience caused. 【Normal Rank - 1 time/day, Bronze Rank - 1 time/day, Silver Rank - 2 times/day, Gold Rank - 3 times/day, Platinum - 5 times/day】
announcement.announcement_simplified: 【系统】从2021年2月10日起，取款次数将根据等级进行更改。目前，我们的提款量非常大，希望我们的会员能够一次完成全部提款，而不是将其分成几笔提款交易来增加流量。这项调整的目的是提高我们的提款效率。给您造成的任何不便，请原谅。【普通等级-1次/天，铜级-1次/天，银级-2次/天，金级-3次/天，白金-5次/天】

announcement.content: 【Promotion】We have upgraded our Weekly Cash Rebate into Daily Cash Rebate effectively starting from 15th March 2021 for Platinum & Gold members. Other rank member will be starting from 22nd March 2021.
announcement.announcement_english: 【Promotion】We have upgraded our Weekly Cash Rebate into Daily Cash Rebate effectively starting from 15th March 2021 for Platinum & Gold members. Other rank member will be starting from 22nd March 2021.
announcement.announcement_simplified: 【优惠】从15th March 2021 起，白金和金会员的每周现金回扣(Weekly Cash Rebate)已升级为每日现金回扣 (Daily Cash Rebate).其他级别成员将从 22nd March 2021 开始.
